cast.name: 玛格丽特·琳赛 Margaret Lindsay
塞德里克·哈德威克 Cedric Hardwicke
安妮塔·露易丝 Anita Louise
斯普林·白灵顿 Spring Byington
沃尔特·艾贝尔 Walter Abel

writer.name: 劳埃德·C·道格拉斯 Lloyd C. Douglas
米尔顿·克里姆斯 Milton Krims

introduction: When his colleague Dr. Endicott is late for an operation, Dr. Newell Paige decides to proceed with Mrs. Endicott's scheduled surgery. The surgery had already been postponed from the previous day and Paige is convinced the surgery needs to go forward without delay. Part way through the operation however, Endicott arrives and takes over only to make a serious error. When a hospital inquiry finds Dr. Paige responsible for Mrs. Dexter's death, he is forced to resign. By chance he meets Mrs. Dexter daughter, Phyllis, and while there is a mutual attraction, she rejects him when she learns his true identity. With little else to do, Paige decides to join his one time hospital colleague in Montana, Dr. John Stafford, who is continuing his tests into spotted fever. Paige is impatient however and decides to test a possible cure on himself.
